game_description: Bird Runners is a fun game where you can chill and hang with other birds! There is a variety of different minigames you could try out as well! Pop on some fancy gear and enjoy your stay here at Birdy World! Play Basketball with your friends, challenge each other to the death in Sword Fighting!
